name: Places Status Indicator
description: Add a menu for quickly navigating places in the system.

name: Removable Drive Menu
description: A status menu for accessing and unmounting removable devices.

name: Caffeine
description: Disable the screensaver and auto suspend

name: Applications Menu
description: Add a category-based menu for applications.

name: AppIndicator Support
description: Adds AppIndicator, KStatusNotifierItem and legacy Tray icons support to the Shell

name: NoAnnoyance v2
description: Removes the 'Windows is ready' notification and puts the window into focus.

description: Next-gen Clipboard manager for Gnome Shell

name: Clipboard Indicator
description: Clipboard Manager extension for Gnome-Shell - Adds a clipboard indicator to the top panel, and caches clipboard history.
